#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	ll n;
	scanf("%lld",&n);
	ll ans=0;
	ll p;
	for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
	    ll temp;
	    scanf("%lld",&temp);
	    if(temp==1)
	    {
	        printf("0\n");
	        continue;
	    }
	    ll t=1;
	    ll k=temp;
	    if(temp%2==0)
	    {
	        p=-1;
	        ans=1;
	    }
	    else
	    {
	        p=1;
	        ans=-1;
	    }
	    for(ll j=2;j<=temp-1;j++)
	    {
	        t*=k;
	        ans+=p*t;
	        p*=-1;
	        k--;
	    }
	    printf("%lld\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
